channel.title: World Wide Wrestling: 1st vs 2nd Ed
channel.description: I've heard different opinions on advantages and disadvantages of 1st and 2nd edition WWW, but I haven't played enough myself to be able to meaningfully gain anything from reading the text. What's your take on this? Is it possible to move some of the things you prefer in one edition over to the other?

item.title: World Wide Wrestling: 1st vs 2nd Ed
item.dc:creator: @Anders

I’ve heard different opinions on advantages and disadvantages of 1st and 2nd edition WWW, but I haven’t played enough myself to be able to meaningfully gain anything from reading the text.
